scenario_text.value: We did it, Takuma!
Yeah. Thanks, Agumon.
So where could the real Kaito be?
Nn... Rrrgh...
Hey, that voice!

Oh, look in the shadows there! It’s Kaito and
Dracumon!
Hey, you’re right! Kaito, Dracumon! Wake up!
Uh, wha’...? Takuma...?

Takuma! You all right, man?! You got carried
off by Ryo and Shuuji, and—!
Hey, calm down, man. I’m fine, honest.
Did you guys see a vision, too?

Yeah, I guess so. Dang, man... My head’s
still spinning.
So that was all...an illusion? A dream?

(To think Kaito and Dracumon would be totally
exhausted like this...)
(They must’ve seen something awful...)

(Maybe they should stick around here for
a while.)

You guys rest here. Me and Agumon will go
look for the others.
Shit... Sorry, man.

We’ll follow up with ya soon. Until then,
it’s on you.
Yeah, we’re on it!
We gotta look for Kaito and the others!

Yeah. I hope nothing bad is happening to
them...
